headline: TRU Simulation and US Aviation Academy sign purchase agreement for five Cessna Skyhawk Veris Virtual Reality Simulators, signifying first fleet order and fixed-wing market debut
summary: LAS VEGAS, October 14, 2025--TRU Simulation + Training Inc. announced an agreement with the US Aviation Academy for its purchase of five Cessna Skyhawk Veris VR Simulators.

content.title: TRU Simulation and US Aviation Academy sign purchase agreement for five Cessna Skyhawk Veris Virtual Reality Simulators, signifying first fleet order and fixed-wing market debut
content.summary: LAS VEGAS, October 14, 2025--TRU Simulation + Training Inc. announced an agreement with the US Aviation Academy for its purchase of five Cessna Skyhawk Veris VR Simulators.

thumbnail.caption: TRU Simulation and US Aviation Academy sign purchase agreement for five Cessna Skyhawk Veris Virtual Reality Simulators, signifying first fleet order and fixed-wing market debut

headline: Best-Selling Cessna Citation Latitude Reach Continues to Grow With First Order in Argentina
summary: LAS VEGAS, October 14, 2025--Textron Aviation Inc., a Textron Inc. (NYSE: TXT) company has announced the first order of its best-selling Cessna Citation Latitude in Argentina. The aircraft, which continues to grow in popularity, was ordered by longtime Citation customer, Jet Clipper S.A., a charter operator in Argentina also covering Uruguay and Paraguay; it is expected to be delivered in 2026.

content.title: Best-Selling Cessna Citation Latitude Reach Continues to Grow With First Order in Argentina
content.summary: LAS VEGAS, October 14, 2025--Textron Aviation Inc., a Textron Inc. (NYSE: TXT) company has announced the first order of its best-selling Cessna Citation Latitude in Argentina. The aircraft, which continues to grow in popularity, was ordered by longtime Citation customer, Jet Clipper S.A., a charter operator in Argentina also covering Uruguay and Paraguay; it is expected to be delivered in 2026.

thumbnail.caption: Best-selling Cessna Citation Latitude reach continues to grow with first order in Argentina (Photo Credit: Textron Aviation).

headline: National Business Aviation Association Signs on to Support the 2026 Special Olympics Airlift
summary: LAS VEGAS, October 14, 2025--During the NBAA-BACE event in Las Vegas, NBAA president and CEO Ed Bolen announced the organization’s endorsement of 2026 Special Olympics Airlift.

content.title: National Business Aviation Association Signs on to Support the 2026 Special Olympics Airlift
content.summary: LAS VEGAS, October 14, 2025--During the NBAA-BACE event in Las Vegas, NBAA president and CEO Ed Bolen announced the organization’s endorsement of 2026 Special Olympics Airlift.

thumbnail.caption: During the National Business Aviation Association – Business Aviation Convention & Exhibition (NBAA-BACE) event in Las Vegas, NBAA president and CEO Ed Bolen announced the organization’s support and endorsement of the 2026 Special Olympics Airlift.

headline: Does Textron Offer Opportunity After Latest Defense Contract Win Amid Market Pullback?
summary: Are you eyeing Textron stock and wondering if now is the moment to make a move, double down, or step back? You are not alone. With a reputation for agility across aviation, defense, and industrial vehicles, Textron is a name investors like to keep on their radar. But recent market action may have you doing a double-take: while Textron has clawed back 0.6% in the last month, it sits down 6.4% over the past week, even as its year-to-date gain stands at an encouraging 7.9%. That kind of...
